story:
THE GLOBAL PLASTIC CRISIS

Plastic waste has become one of the most pressing environmental challenges of the 21st Century.  Globally, we produce over 300 million tons of plastic every year and recycle only 8%.  This amount is expected to double within the next 10 years! 

In the US alone, roughly 28 million tons of plastic is sent to landfills every year at the staggering cost of over $1.5 billion dollars annually.

HOW MUCH IS 28 MILLION TONS?

Imagine using all of the plastic waste we see polluting our oceans, parks, roadways, and neighborhoods to rebuild our communities without long processing times, labor-intensive overhead, or toxic output. 

At ByFusion, we envision a future where communities can put their plastic waste to work immediately – building infrastructure, housing, and municipal projects.  And now, we can.  

WHAT IS BYFUSION?

ByFusion is a 100% modular technology platform that converts all types of waste plastic into an alternative building material called RePlast.  Our eco-friendly process is a low emission and non-toxic way to “upcycle” plastic waste from our communities, coastlines, and landfills into a readily-usable new product.

ByFusion has been designed as a key component in promoting community-based circular economies – fully supporting the ability to convert plastic waste generated within a city into a building material that can be used locally for construction, infrastructure, and development projects.  

ByFusion is capable of processing plastic collected from our oceans and coastlines and diverting millions of tons of plastic from landfills, saving taxpayers and municipal governments billions of dollars in costs, and creating jobs through local and regional business development.

THE BYFUSION PROCESS

Most people are not aware there are actually 7 types of plastics. However, due to high processing costs, toxicity, safety concerns and potential contamination, only 3 types (1-3) are commonly processed.  However, even the commonly processed plastic must first be sorted and cleaned and often must be sent to processing centers far from its point of entry into the waste stream.

ByFusion has addressed this challenge by designing a system that can process ALL types of plastic waste, individually or mixed and clean or contaminated.  Since our platform is modular, it can be easily transported to where it’s needed the most, and can be used as a temporary or permanent addition to local waste management processing.  

REPLAST BLOCKS – A 100% RECYCLED NEW BUILDING MATERIAL

We have configured our pilot ByFusion technology to produce blocks with the size and dimensions of common concrete blocks that are designed to suit a wide variety of infrastructure, development, and construction projects.

Characteristics of RePlast Block

  • 95% lower Greenhouse Gas Emissions (GhG) during production than concrete
  • Better thermal and sound insultating capabilities than concrete block
  • Can contribute to USGBC LEED certification
  • Flexible manufacturing process - capable of producing different sizes, shapes, and colors
  • Requires no glues or adhesives for use

RePlast is an inexpensive, fit-for-purpose material that can be put to use fast using materials that are literally being thrown away every day in every community on the planet.

RePlast can be used for a wide variety of municipal projects including highway sound barriers, environmental retaining walls, thermal insulation for industrial and residential construction, and crash barriers.  We are continually exploring new ways to use our products.

OUR STORY 
Our team came together because our world is drowning in plastic waste and we were (and still are!) passionately committed to finding a solution.

We kept hearing about organizations and volunteers investing thousands of hours to clean up the plastic on our beaches, parks, waterways and communities but started asking ourselves, "Where does it go?" 

Sure, some of it gets recycled but most of it ends right back into our broken waste management systems and potentially back into the ocean.

We wanted to find a solution that

  1. Is easy to deploy and can be sent directly to plastic pollution hotspots
  2. Put all of the plastic waste to work – permanently
  3. Is cost effective to build and scale
  4. Produced a cost effective product that could be used by anyone
  5. Maximized the efforts of those organizations and volunteers who are passionate about cleaning up our planet
  6. Created jobs

And so, ByFusion was born.

PUTTING BYFUSION INTO ACTION

                                                       

We are partnering with innovative non-profits including our good friends at Sustainable Coastlines Hawaii to bring our technology directly to one of the most important and heavily impacted areas on the planet.

The first SCH-ByFusion joint project will focus on the plastic accumulating across all of the Hawaiian Islands, including the Papahānaumokuākea Marine National Monument, a protected area that is littered with tens of thousands of tons of plastic waste. 

This is an incredibly important area both for Hawaiians and for the world, with extensive coral reefs that are home to over 7,000 marine species, one quarter of which are found only in the Hawaiian Archipelago.

The area is one of the planet’s great biodiversity hotspots, and is one of the largest marine conservation areas in the world. It encompasses 139,797 square miles of the Pacific Ocean which also puts it directly in the path of millions of tons of floating plastic waste.  This plastic, including an ever-increasing amount of derelict fishing nets, is damaging the pristine coral reefs as well as directly impacting the health of the endangered Hawaiian monk seal population. 

WE ARE 100% COMMITTED TO HELPING OUR PLANET - ARE YOU? 

GET ENGAGED!

We have the technology and there is endless plastic waste abound but, we need your help!  

Our team is committed to making the ByFusion machine available to the masses and building strong alliances to close the loop on plastic clean up initiatives and put our waste to work.

Your donations will enable us to do the following:

  1. Put our technology directly to work on our first project with Sustainable Coastlines Hawaii,
  2. Complete the required US testing to list RePlast as an approved US building material, 
  3. Upgrade our current pilot machine to increase the amount of plastic we can process (we are estimating a 44% increase from 7,000 blocks per day to 10,000!), 
  4. Expand our manufacturing capabilities to produce more ByFusion machines.

Your donations gives you the opportunity to truly make a difference. Join our extended team in helping to bring awareness about this crisis, serve as a community liaison or as part of our advisory network to help us find communities and projects that desperately need a way to handle plastic pollution, and more!

Together, we CAN save the planet!

FAQs

How is the ByFusion machine powered?

The ByFusion machine can be configured to run on propane gas or electricity. Propane gas is ideal in supporting its mobility especially in times of natural disasters. We are currently in talks with the innovative, emerging solar companies to create a solar powered ByFusion machine.

When will the ByFusion machine be available in the US?

Thanks to you, we are targeting May 2, 2017. We'll keep you posted every step of the journey!

Has ByFusion been recognized for its capabilities?

YES! We were so happy to be awarded the Northeast CleanTech Open ACRE Award for Sustainability in October 2015.

                                                

What can RePlast block be used for today?

Currently, RePlast blocks are structured as a fit-for-purpose material. This means we are able to control the density and weight of the current block material. In the US, they are perfect for walling applications, non-inhabited structures (park facilities, warehouses, rest areas, roadways projects, additional layers to enhance insulating properties and acoustics to name a few.

Outside of the US, RePlast can be to build single-story, single family homes and other inhabited spaces up.

What does fit-for-purpose mean?

For RePlast, fit-for-purpose means that it meets the required standard for the job it is intended to perform. Since RePlast is customizable in shape, density and weight, it can perform many different jobs or serve many different purposes.

Are the RePlast blocks fire resistant?

Currently, and without additional additives, RePlast holds similar fire rating to that of Trex lumber. Fire retardants, can be used during the manufacturing process to enhance its resistance. Additional testing is required. 

How heavy are the RePlast blocks?

We are able to control the weight/density of RePlast.  We can make them anywhere from 8 - 27 lbs/3.5 - 12 Kg. 

This RePlast blocks you see in the pictures above are 22 lbs/10 kg.

Do you need special tools to install RePlast?

No. RePlast is currently configured to stack like a Lego! No glues, mortars or adhesives are required either. Check out our video to see how RePlast works.

How long as ByFusion been around?

The current pilot machine came to life in 2012 and our next generation designs and more R&D have been underway ever since.  ByFusion PBC opened its doors in July 2015.

Can you drill into RePlast?

Yes! You bet.

PERKS

1) ByFusion Apparel

T-shirts available in men and women sizes. Please specify. Hoodies are unisex. Baseball caps are adult one size fits all.

All ByFusion apparel and products are, of course, eco-friendly and some, if not all, contain recycled materials.

2) 3" x 3" RePlast Block

This is an example of size only. Color will vary.
THANK YOU!!
story_txt:
THE GLOBAL PLASTIC CRISISPlastic waste has become
one of the most pressing environmental challenges of the 21st
Century.  Globally, we produce over 300
million tons of plastic every year and recycle only 8%.  This amount is expected to double within the next 10 years! In the US alone, roughly 28
million tons of plastic is sent to landfills every year at the staggering cost
of over $1.5 billion dollars annually.HOW MUCH IS 28 MILLION TONS?
Imagine
using all of the plastic waste we see polluting our oceans, parks,
roadways, and neighborhoods to rebuild our communities without long processing
times, labor-intensive overhead, or toxic output. At ByFusion, we envision a future where communities can put their plastic waste to work immediately – building infrastructure, housing, and municipal projects.  And now, we can.  
WHAT IS BYFUSION?
ByFusion is a 100% modular technology platform
that converts all types of waste plastic into an alternative building material called
RePlast.  Our eco-friendly process is a low emission and non-toxic way to “upcycle” plastic waste from our communities, coastlines, and landfills into a
readily-usable new product.ByFusion has been designed
as a key component in
promoting community-based circular economies – fully supporting the ability to convert plastic waste generated
within a city into a building material that can be used locally for
construction, infrastructure, and development projects.  ByFusion is capable of processing plastic collected from our oceans and coastlines and diverting millions of tons of
plastic from landfills, saving taxpayers and municipal governments billions of dollars
in costs, and creating jobs through local and regional business development.
THE BYFUSION PROCESSMost people are not aware there are actually 7 types of plastics. However, due to high processing costs, toxicity, safety concerns and potential contamination, only 3
types (1-3) are commonly processed.  However, even the commonly processed plastic must first be sorted and cleaned and often must be sent to
processing centers far from its point of entry into the waste stream.
ByFusion has addressed
this challenge by designing a system that can process ALL types of plastic waste, individually or mixed and clean
or contaminated.  Since our platform is
modular, it can be easily transported to where it’s needed the most, and can be
used as a temporary or permanent addition to local waste management processing.  
REPLAST BLOCKS – A 100%
RECYCLED NEW BUILDING MATERIAL
We have configured our
pilot ByFusion technology to produce blocks with the size and dimensions of common concrete blocks that
are designed to suit a wide variety of infrastructure, development, and
construction projects.

Characteristics of RePlast
Block

95% lower Greenhouse Gas Emissions (GhG) during production than concrete 


Better thermal and sound insultating capabilities than concrete block

Can contribute to USGBC LEED certification

Flexible manufacturing process - capable of producing
different sizes, shapes, and colors


Requires no glues or adhesives for use


RePlast is an inexpensive, fit-for-purpose
material that can be put to use fast using materials that are literally
being thrown away every day in every community on the planet.
RePlast can be used for a
wide variety of municipal projects including highway sound barriers, environmental
retaining walls, thermal
insulation for industrial and residential construction, and crash
barriers.  We are continually exploring
new ways to use our products.

Put all of the plastic waste to work – permanently

Is cost effective to build and scale

Maximized the efforts of those organizations and volunteers who are passionate about cleaning up our planet
Created jobs

And so, ByFusion was born.

waste to work.

story:
My name is Elizabeth!

It’s a dream come trough. I was always drawn to nature and now I feel like I can do something to protect it.

I have always admired the bees, and I am attracted to beekeeping as a valuable occupation. Now I will finally launch my own colony. Through beekeeping I could live a meaningful and fulfilling life. My hobby will be my job.

 

 I learned beekeeping and I would love to start my own colonies for which I need your help.

 

 


I have a hectare of land  with beautiful walnut trees. There are forests and farms around us which are excellent places for feeding and gathering of nectar and pollen. Everything is perfect for beekeeping.

Honey bees are very important to our ecosystem. The bees need the flowers for food, while the flower needs the bee to reproduce. Without them many crops would die.

Remove the bee from the earth and at the same stroke you remove at least one hundred thousand plants that will not survive.

What will the funding be used?

The grant allows me to launch the business. Depending on the size of the support for the purchase of 1-20 hives. Frames nucleus of bees, frames of honey bees, with brood , food and the all important Queen. These are usually called 'nucs' . The necessary beekeeping equipment. Website to bring awareness to the importance of bees, and to sell our beautiful honey and other hive products. Beeswax can be used for making candles, polish, soap, cosmetics, etc.

What we need

In order to keep Bees I will need some specialist equipment which will not only protect me but help me in handling the bees

Hives

Bees

Bee Suit with Veil,

Hygenic Gloves to protect me and the Bees,

Hive Tool to help me move frames

Smoker to help me calm the bees.

Brood and super frames

Foundation wax sheets

Web site

What You Get

Sticker
Picture Postcard

 


Mug

T-shirt

 

Be a part of a miracle!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute directly, please share this campaign to those whom may be interested!

story:
SUMMARY

Our New Company is called Renewable Solutions of Iowa. We are brothers that have joined our areas of expertise to develop a solar farm. I work for a solar company and have a background in the financial industry. My Brother has background in development.  Together we make a great team!  A few years ago our community was hit with a tremendous flood that devastated the community. Always looking for a way to help our community, we have decided to develop a 24 MW solar farm.  With your help we can continue with this project which will allow us to generate additional projects in the future leaving an even larger impact with clean renewable energy for our country. You can be a part of that legacy by contributing to the project. You can have your name associated with this facility in other ways. Take a look at our perks and see how!

What We Need & What You Get

To get this project off the ground we will need to do a number of studies and engineering.  To help with the additional estimated $85,000-$100,000 in “pre-construction” cost, we are asking for contributions of $10, $25, $50, $100, $500, $1,000, $5,000, $10,000 or $25,000.  The money will help with costs of the feasibility studies, System Impact Studies, and engineering.  We appreciate your generosity and help in bringing our vision to life! 


The Impact

 Along with creating jobs for the community, this project will generate enough electricity for almost 4,000 homes and will be the largest solar farm in the state of Iowa. We believe that renewable energy is the future of the planet and we want to leave with a legacy and impact on the world.


Risks & Challenges

 Throughout the process there will be soil tests, system studies to make sure the electric grid can handle the power, and impact studies to make sure the community will not be affected negatively.  Through all of these tests and studies there will be hurdles to overcome and we have all the drive in the world to see this project through to its completion! 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Help us get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
THE BIG QUESTION

WHY DOES ONE SUPERCELL PRODUCE A TORNADO, WHILE ANOTHER NEARBY SUPERCELL DOES NOT?

It was a hot, muggy day—prime conditions for Arizona monsoon magic. With chasers awaiting storm development in Casa Grande, an unexpected change of winds occurs when suddenly, a large dust devil fires up nearby. We ask ourselves, “Why did the dust devil form right there? The whole surface of the Arizona desert was primed for a dust devil 'outbreak.'" Then, the thought occurs: “What does the surface data look like before a tornado touches down? Why does it touch down in one specific location when the whole state was primed for “touchdown”? Why didn’t other supercells produce? Is it possible to create a formula that would have the ability to forecast an area where a tornado will develop minutes, even hours, before touchdown? Perhaps collecting multiple ground-level measurements from hundreds of dust devils could help us understand the exact surface parameters needed for tornadogenesis to occur? By studying surface conditions before, during, and after dust devil development, could the recorded data provide the missing combination?

By documenting hundreds of dust devils, our primary focus is to dissect surface conditions before, during, and after a dust devil forms. Our instruments would collect temperature, dew point, pressure, wind, and visual data, among others. In theory, we hope to develop some sort of formula that would forecast the exact time and location of dust devil development far ahead of initiation. In turn, this formula could be used to predict which supercells will produce tornadoes and which will not. Perhaps the ingredients needed for dust devil formation are what attract tornadoes to touchdown, as well?

FUNDING BREAKDOWN

Our field work will involve multiple components. First, there will be a grid of sensors, comprised of several Kestrel weather meters mounted to weighted tripods. These will measure wind speed, temperature, barometric pressure, dew point, and more very near the surface, and they will be arranged in rows across a fixed testing site at the Santa Cruz Flats near Eloy, AZ. Also, we will be utilizing two small drones. One will be equipped with a small camera and a Kestrel weather meter in order to probe the inside of the dust devils, while the other drone will feature a thermal camera to take ground-level thermal measurements from above. The final component of our field work is a set of mobile, ground-based probes. The crux of these probes will be a large soccer cone equipped with a Kestrel weather meter and a small camera; these will be manually deployed in each dust devil's path.

In order to compile the most accurate and precise data possible, high-quality and durable weather instruments must be used. As a result, our plan is a costly endeavor. The approximate costs of each component of our field work break down as follows:

  • Kestrel weather meters (28) - $9,000
  • Tripods for Kestrel weather meters (25) - $1,300
  • Quadcopters/drones (2) - $900
  • Thermal cameras (2) - $1,400
  • Cameras for mobile probes/drone (4) - $200
  • Soccer cones for mobile probes (3) - $10
We are trying to raise $10,000 here on IndieGoGo. All of the funds raised from this campaign will go toward purchasing the equipment needed for our field work. The total cost of all the equipment listed above is greater than the $10,000 that we are trying to raise; however, we are working hard to save up our own money to cover the remaining costs of the equipment. If we don't reach our goal, we will continue to work hard to save our own money to cover the costs of the equipment. This may prolong the field work process, but we will continue to strive to compile the best data possible to decipher the mystery surrounding why some supercell thunderstorms produce tornadoes and some do not!
Any help is appreciated; we thank you very much for your support!

PERKS
As a thank you for contributing, we have several great perks available! Every person who donates will receive a thank you email written by all three of us. If you decide to contribute $25 or $50, you'll receive items with our project logo (see first image above), including a coffee mug and/or a t-shirt. A $100 contribution will reward you with a 14x14 canvas print of your choice of one of our photos of the incredible storms and tornadoes we have witnessed while storm chasing. You can see more of the amazing storms and tornadoes we have witnessed by contributing $250, which rewards you with a professionally assembled photo calendar.
A $500 contributing rewards you with a 30-minute Skype conversation with all three of us! You can ask us anything from tips about storm chasing to how we got into storm chasing to how the Arizona monsoon works to questions about the Dust Devil Project, of course. We will contact you to select a mutually agreeable date and time to have the Skype conversation; while we can't guarantee that all dates will be available, we will try our best to accommodate your requests.
$1000, $5000, and $10,000 contributions all reward you with an experience of a lifetime - a storm chasing adventure during the monsoon season here in the Desert Southwest! We will take you out on a 3-day, 1-week, or 2-week (respectively) storm chase trip across New Mexico, Arizona, California, and/or maybe even Utah to chase amazing monsoon storms! You may bring up to one other person with you; airfare, lodging, and food expenses are NOT included. We will send out much more information regarding the logistics and guidelines of these chase trips via email if you select these perks.
After the campaign is over, we will send out an email to those who select perks that require shipping in order to obtain any pertinent information (shipping address, etc.).
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
If you are unable to make a monetary contribution to our campaign, please help us spread the word about our project! Share our project and our IndieGoGo campaign with your friends, family, coworkers, and more through word of mouth and social media. Thank you for your help in helping our project get off and running!

THE IMPACT - "HOT SPOT" THEORY IN ACTION

• 20-25% of rotating supercells produce a tornado.

• 50%-70% tornado warnings are false alarms.

• Many fatalities from tornadoes occur due to previous “false alarm” tornado warnings.

We hypothesize that low-level and surface atmospheric parameter spikes will tell us when and where a dust devil and, similarly, a tornado will form, well in advance of the formation of the vortex.

We hope that these "hot spots" will be able to accurately predict tornadogenesis minutes, even hours, before a tornado actually touches down, both drastically increasing tornado warning lead time and decreasing tornado-related fatalities due to tornado warnings that turn out to be "false alarms."

For example, take a chase day on the Great Plains. Conditions across Oklahoma are primed for a tornado outbreak. A High Risk has been issued by the Storm Prediction Center. Chasers are beaming with anticipation, while residents are praying for a “blue sky bust.” Multiple supercell thunderstorms fire up, but which one is going to produce a tornado? 

After supercell development, meteorologists can plug in the “hot spot” formula. This formula would filter through ALL ongoing current atmospheric conditions. Once complete, the end result would highlight the “hot spots” or “instigators” most likely to produce tornadoes in supercells that pass over them.

In the above image, the small circular red dots are “hot spots” awaiting to tilt a horizontal convective roll (the seed of a tornado) into the vertical. A supercell thunderstorm becomes tornadic once it crosses over a “hot spot,” while a supercell thunderstorm that does not pass over a “hot spot” will not produce a tornado.

With your help, we will be able to figure out the perfect combination of low-level atmospheric and surface-based ingredients - "hot spots" - that allow supercell thunderstorms to produce tornadoes. As a result, we will be able to pinpoint which storms will produce tornadoes and which will not, ultimately increasing tornado warning lead time and, hopefully, saving lives.
THANK YOU
Thank you very much for taking the time to learn about our project and our IndieGoGo campaign; this project would not be possible without your incredible support and generous contributions. Please visit our website, stormchasearizona.wix.com/thedustdevilproject, and our Facebook page, facebook.com/thedustdevilproject, for more information on our project, including updates on how the project is coming along. Questions or comments about our project? Feel free to email us at thedustdevilproject@gmail.com. 
Thank you again for your time and generosity!

In theory, we hope to develop some sort of formula that would forecast the exact time and location of dust devil development far ahead of initiation. In turn, this formula could be used to predict which supercells will produce tornadoes and which will not. Perhaps the ingredients needed for dust devil formation are what attract tornadoes to touchdown, as well?FUNDING BREAKDOWNOur field work will involve multiple components. First, there will be a grid of sensors, comprised of several Kestrel weather meters mounted to weighted tripods. These will measure wind speed, temperature, barometric pressure, dew point, and more very near the surface, and they will be arranged in rows across a fixed testing site at the Santa Cruz Flats near Eloy, AZ. Also, we will be utilizing two small drones. One will be equipped with a small camera and a Kestrel weather meter in order to probe the inside of the dust devils, while the other drone will feature a thermal camera to take ground-level thermal measurements from above. The final component of our field work is a set of mobile, ground-based probes. The crux of these probes will be a large soccer cone equipped with a Kestrel weather meter and a small camera; these will be manually deployed in each dust devil's path.In order to compile the most accurate and precise data possible, high-quality and durable weather instruments must be used. As a result, our plan is a costly endeavor. The approximate costs of each component of our field work break down as follows:
Kestrel weather meters (28) - $9,000
Tripods for Kestrel weather meters (25) - $1,300
Quadcopters/drones (2) - $900
Thermal cameras (2) - $1,400
Cameras for mobile probes/drone (4) - $200
Soccer cones for mobile probes (3) - $10
We are trying to raise $10,000 here on IndieGoGo. All of the funds raised from this campaign will go toward purchasing the equipment needed for our field work. The total cost of all the equipment listed above is greater than the $10,000 that we are trying to raise; however, we are working hard to save up our own money to cover the remaining costs of the equipment. If we don't reach our goal, we will continue to work hard to save our own money to cover the costs of the equipment. This may prolong the field work process, but we will continue to strive to compile the best data possible to decipher the mystery surrounding why some supercell thunderstorms produce tornadoes and some do not!Any help is appreciated; we thank you very much for your support!

PERKSAs a thank you for contributing, we have several great perks available! Every person who donates will receive a thank you email written by all three of us. If you decide to contribute $25 or $50, you'll receive items with our project logo (see first image above), including a coffee mug and/or a t-shirt. A $100 contribution will reward you with a 14x14 canvas print of your choice of one of our photos of the incredible storms and tornadoes we have witnessed while storm chasing. You can see more of the amazing storms and tornadoes we have witnessed by contributing $250, which rewards you with a professionally assembled photo calendar.A $500 contributing rewards you with a 30-minute Skype conversation with all three of us! You can ask us anything from tips about storm chasing to how we got into storm chasing to how the Arizona monsoon works to questions about the Dust Devil Project, of course. We will contact you to select a mutually agreeable date and time to have the Skype conversation; while we can't guarantee that all dates will be available, we will try our best to accommodate your requests.$1000, $5000, and $10,000 contributions all reward you with an experience of a lifetime - a storm chasing adventure during the monsoon season here in the Desert Southwest! We will take you out on a 3-day, 1-week, or 2-week (respectively) storm chase trip across New Mexico, Arizona, California, and/or maybe even Utah to chase amazing monsoon storms! You may bring up to one other person with you; airfare, lodging, and food expenses are NOT included. We will send out much more information regarding the logistics and guidelines of these chase trips via email if you select these perks.After the campaign is over, we will send out an email to those who select perks that require shipping in order to obtain any pertinent information (shipping address, etc.).OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELPIf you are unable to make a monetary contribution to our campaign, please help us spread the word about our project! Share our project and our IndieGoGo campaign with your friends, family, coworkers, and more through word of mouth and social media. Thank you for your help in helping our project get off and running!



THE IMPACT - "HOT SPOT" THEORY IN ACTION

• 20-25% of rotating supercells produce a tornado.
• 50%-70% tornado warnings are false alarms.
• Many fatalities from tornadoes occur due to previous “false alarm” tornado warnings.


We hypothesize that low-level and surface atmospheric parameter spikes will tell us when and where a dust devil and, similarly, a tornado will form, well in advance of the formation of the vortex.
We hope that these "hot spots" will be able to accurately predict tornadogenesis minutes, even hours, before a tornado actually touches down, both drastically increasing tornado warning lead time and decreasing tornado-related fatalities due to tornado warnings that turn out to be "false alarms."
For example, take a chase day on the Great Plains. Conditions across Oklahoma are primed for a tornado outbreak. A High Risk has been issued by the Storm Prediction Center. Chasers are beaming with anticipation, while residents are praying for a “blue sky bust.” Multiple supercell thunderstorms fire up, but which one is going to produce a tornado? 
After supercell development, meteorologists can plug in the “hot spot” formula. This formula would filter through ALL ongoing current atmospheric conditions. Once complete, the end result would highlight the “hot spots” or “instigators” most likely to produce tornadoes in supercells that pass over them.


In the above image, the small circular red dots are “hot spots” awaiting to tilt a horizontal convective roll (the seed of a tornado) into the vertical. A supercell thunderstorm becomes tornadic once it crosses over a “hot spot,” while a supercell thunderstorm that does not pass over a “hot spot” will not produce a tornado.With your help, we will be able to figure out the perfect combination of low-level atmospheric and surface-based ingredients - "hot spots" - that allow supercell thunderstorms to produce tornadoes. As a result, we will be able to pinpoint which storms will produce tornadoes and which will not, ultimately increasing tornado warning lead time and, hopefully, saving lives.
THANK YOU
Thank you very much for taking the time to learn about our project and our IndieGoGo campaign; this project would not be possible without your incredible support and generous contributions. Please visit our website, stormchasearizona.wix.com/thedustdevilproject, and our Facebook page, facebook.com/thedustdevilproject, for more information on our project, including updates on how the project is coming along. Questions or comments about our project? Feel free to email us at thedustdevilproject@gmail.com. Thank you again for your time and generosity!

story:
Background

My name is Han Parker. I'm a father, a filmmaker and an activist. 
If even one quarter of the predictions from scientists on the negative impacts of man made global warming comes true... I will not look my children in the eye and tell them I did nothing... that we did nothing. 

It's up to us...
The US government allocated about $640 Billion to the government this year alone. Science and the environment got roughly 1% of our military budget. This is incredibly frightening to me. In a time when the scientific consensus has set the doomsday clock at 11:58, congress is still not taking these issues seriously... so it is up to us. I want to show that with a small amount of money, and a large amount of attention, we can take back control of the future of the planet and the entire human race.
I'm asking for $1 billion and I have broken down exactly how some of that could be easily appropriated to tackle problems such as drought, pollution, oil spills, lack of resources, etc. As well as how we can move many industries towards sustainability. I also have a strong desire to help regain true democracy, where the power is in the hands of the many, not the few. This project is a chance to move together, as a community, towards a greener Earth, towards mass sustainability across all industries and towards a more transparent government that listens to it's people.
If $1 billion seems like a lot to ask for, consider that Americans alone spent about $4.5 billion in one day not to long ago... it was on St. Patrick's Day. $4.5 billion in one day, on beer. So we can do this! Lets not let beer be more important than the environment!!
I've generated some fun perks but please understand that your donations should be based off of your desire to do good for the planet! Lets do this together, lets not wait, the time for debate is over, the time for action is now. This is the vehicle!
If you have children, if you have a spouse, a father, a mother. If someone you love, resides on this planet, please start taking this seriously before it is to late. Here is what we can do with  $1 billion. I've listed it in monetary order, as in, the more we raise, the further down the list we can go.


- BAN 2 STROKE ENGINES

This doesn't even take a lot of money, just community and awareness. We are talking about street blowers and a lot of lawn mowers. A little research will show you that they put out a boatload of unfiltered particulate matter that is downright horrible for you. Think of every lawn, in every neighborhood, all over California alone, with millions of these things running night and day. They can be easily replaced with electric motor versions. Stop these alone and we can probably cut pollution back by at least 10-15% nationwide. It can be our first immediate action and in the process we will refine our strategies and then go after bigger issues next. If you want to see 2 stroke engines banned, donate now.


- BUILD AN INTERACTIVE, "GREEN" PROMOTING, SOCIAL WEBSITE or the Green Version of Facebook!

Imagine a website that aims to bring a large community together and engage in Earth saving, "green" activities everyday. Imagine if you could log into a website and track any green saving activities that you participated in. If you opted to turn off your power for the day, or rode your bike to work instead of driving, planted a tree, picked up some trash, stopped eating meat, whatever it was, you could track it all. 

We would encourage people to engage in these green saving activities, then log into the website and track their activities. At the end of every month, and then again at the end of every year, we would release how much change we have affected.  Statistics that say, our community saved XX amount of power this month, our community planted XX amount of trees and picked up XX lbs. of trash, and XX amount of people stopped eating meat and XX amount of people recycled their old cars, XX amount of petitions were signed, etc. etc. And we could really SEE an incredible amount of change happening. More people would join the movement, now imagine if we had 50 million people involved, all tracking their green activities, and how much change we could enable!! 

The website also functions as a resource and directory to identify other groups/organizations who are trying to save the world, other movements that are happening and how you can get involved. A place for petitions to be created, discussed and signed. Also it would be place to see awesome videos on all sorts of cool, earth saving content (which I’ll talk about later) and it could be like a reward system where the more things you take part in, the more points you get, and then our green sponsors will be giving out rewards based off of how good you’re doing (maybe you win a trip to Leo DiCaprio's Eco Resort or something).This website is vital in that it could bring everyone together, working together, affecting real change, and promoting and motivating others to join, participate and excel. If you love this idea and want to be part of a green community that works together for the greater good, donate now and lets get this incredible website made.


- PLANT 1 BILLION TREES BY 2017

Scientists agree that the planting of about 1 billion trees would almost definitely have a significant, positive impact on the world in so many ways. Not just in the amount of C02 that would be sucked out of the atmosphere, but creating new ecosystems for species, helping nearly extinct species regain their footholds in otherwise decimated areas, increasing the scientific studies of plants and their relations to medicine… as we regrow our forests, we regrow the worlds gardens and in these gardens we will find nature’s medicines. 

A lot of other companies are claiming to do this, but it has to be done right and I think we can easily make a difference. Which is why I’m saying that we can plant one billion trees by 2017. When I say done right, the only thing worth really taking into serious account with a project like this is “invasive species” right? You can’t just go running around planting a bunch of random seeds in any old place. You could actually wreak havoc on the local ecosystem and cause more damage than good. Local committees need to be put together throughout the country that could identify “appropriate plants” that could be safely planted/integrated into said ecosystems and balance that information against what scientists tell us are the best “CO2 sucking” trees and plants. We should make sure the “area” that they are potentially looking at can sustain a bunch of new trees and then we can responsibly plant those trees/plants and thereby increase their chance of being a positive addition to that certain ecosystem. If you want to contribute to the world being a greener place, donate now.


- DOCUMENTARY

Addiction Planet

A never before seen look into the world's addiction to war, power, wealth, nuclear, deforestation, overfishing and overpopulation. Once we can truly understand and admit to these addictions, we can finally begin to overcome them. Trailer is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qiPA3ohXR0Q

Ultimately, if enough money is raised, I'd like to start a production company that makes powerful documentaries that expose environmental coverups like Fukushima and other environmental disasters. This documentary really sets the tone for the type of content that we would potentially cover. We are still in the $250,000 range here. Please, if this teaser compels you to act, please donate now.


- SCIENTIFIC SYMPOSIUM

I would fund a gathering of the brightest minds in science, environment, biology, etc. to get together and for one month, only focus on the world's top 10 problems and how to overcome them. We would film the whole thing and make all the info available to the public. Unlike the UN's climate talks we would have transparency and encourage others to get involved. Why does Germany have superior solar power than the US? We are no longer talking about a countrywide issue here, we are talking global issues. These symposiums would encourage all countries to share their “green” and “sustainability” based sciences and notes. Lets all get on this together and we can probably knock it all out in a couple of years. If you want to see the top minds in science come together and discuss in an open format, where you can participate and voice your opinions, donate now.


- FUND SCIENCE FOR SOLAR, DESALINATION PLANTS, HEMP, ETC. 

We absolutely need to invest in more sustainable practices and materials!! I think investing in not only hemp research and technology and the application of it in the 21st century… but also many other sustainable materials that could replace more vital resources that we are running out of… such as building materials, commonly used and discarded products, toys, and just any mass consumed product. Also would invest in things such as free energy resources like the Tesla Coil, the solar powered sterling engine, desalination, etc. I’m tired of not putting the research into these potentially life-changing technologies. I don't think we would even have to necessarily fund it, but more bring attention to it through our community and ask governments to fund it.

We have to catch up with Germany on solar. Solar should be used as an example to  share vital earth technologies worldwide, for the sake of our futures. Once we get solar up to an amazing level of efficiency, we can start really ramping up desalination plants which of course can go along way to alleviate the drought conditions. Lets get the science straight, please donate now.


- DESALINATION PLANTS

It's silly to sit on the largest body of water on earth and be in a drought (I Live in California). We built the large hadron collider, we can suck some salt water out of the ocean and make it drinkable, usable at least to water all our lawn and golf courses and we can save the rest for drinking. I know there are some hurdles to overcome, especially environmentally, but we can overcome those hurdles for the sake of our futures. The old problem with Desalination Plants is that they consume a massive amount of power, a problem that now can be overcome by more efficient solar power practices. These could help contribute to solving worldwide thirst and lack of clean water problems... one of the most dire problems we face today. If you want to help see more of these come online, please donate now.


- NEWS STATION

Fund a news station that only focuses on positive, earth saving activities. You can go there anytime and they are only covering stories about these top 10 problems that are destroying the earth, what’s being done to tackle them, who is doing it, resources to get involved. Of course it is also focusing on positive stories of who is out there really affecting positive change. If you want a positive news station who is watching out for your best interests, donate now.


- PRODUCTION COMPANY

We shoot documentaries and pieces about all the bad and all the good. We point cameras at bad things and say, “Go clean it up, the world is watching.” We make little shows about how to garden, grow fish and become self sustainable. We keep the world updated on the progress of other projects and the successes of the organization. We don’t let anyone filter us, we save the world through cinema. Pointing a spotlight at the bad things and asking them to be fixed. Highlighting all the positives and reminding you how you can be involved in saving the world. Then they can’t control us. Lets make our own production company, please donate now.

POLICY IDEAS:

- NO MORE NUCLEAR PLANTS

WE HAVE ONE 9.0 EARTHQUAKE SOMEWHERE and a bunch of plants leak and humanity is gone, done, wiped out. We must immediately fix every leaking reactor in the country and never again build another unless it can survive an 11.0 earthquake, a nuclear bomb, a tsunami, a tornado and all of those all at once! Because otherwise… again a massive nuclear leak is one of the few things that can literally wipeout a large portion of humanity. 

- STRIP MINERS MUST REPLACE THE FOREST AND ECOSYSTEM THEY STRIP

This will deter Todd Hoffman like characters all over the world, who are allowed to go strip acres of forest in a blind, idiotic pursuit of precious metals. Many times they find nothing, and walk away, leaving the forest and ecosystem decimated with absolutely no economic return. I say we make them regrow anything they tear down, which will also deter more people from just haphazardly taking on such ventures.


- FLEXIBLE PLAN

Finally, I'm open to other ideas too! I'm in no rush to spend all of the money, but I want to show the world what we can do with a little bit of money. Congress just spent $640 billion on our military... who are we fighting again? Dudes in the sand with swords. The war machine must no longer outweigh the priorities of the population and therefore the environment. I know it’s a lot of money to ask for, but America just spent $4.32 billion in one day… on beer. So lets not let beer be more important than the world.

Please help in any way you can. If you can't spare some change, please share this project because building a large community is just as necessary as contributing. If you can't spare, please share! Indiegogo says please use their share tools! Feel free to setup your own fundraisers for the project, I'm a working dad, trying to support four kids and a wonderful wife while I run this campaign.

Please guys, we are at the precipice, the tipping point. Change will come, either in the form of activism and community or it will come in the form of chaos and violence as mother nature fights back the rape and pillage of the planet. This era will be forever remembered throughout the rest of history, that is for sure. How they judge us and the legacy that we will leave is in our hands, right now. Will we be the one's who did nothing, and allowed greed and corruption to consume this beautiful planet and many of it's inhabitants... or will we be remembered as the ones who stood up and put an end to tyranny? The choice is ours, the time is now. Spare or share, or both.

Change will come, either in the form of activism and community or it will come in the form of chaos and violence as mother nature fights back the rape and pillage of the planet. This era will be forever remembered throughout the rest of history, that is for sure. How they judge us and the legacy that we will leave is in our hands, right now. Will we be the one's who did nothing, and allowed greed and corruption to consume this beautiful planet and many of it's inhabitants... or will we be remembered as the ones who stood up and put an end to tyranny? The choice is ours, the time is now. Spare or share, or both.

story:
Our campaign:

It is estimated that over 1 BILLION people are currently living in slums and the number expects to grow to over 2 BILLION by the year 2030. The sadness is that it is mostly in inhuman condition. Any upset (fire, mudslides, bad weather, etc) leads to traumatic upset in people’s lives and leaves them in very difficult circumstances.

These are poor communities and either rebuilding or repairing a “shack” after a disaster is out of reach for most of the people and is done with inferior materials. Circumstances usually go from bad to worse.

Building methods are complex and building materials expensive. Informal settlements are build from bits and pieces.

It is important to us to drive this campaign to find easy, cheap DIY alternative building methods for people to build livable, durable, neat housing, “ONE BLOCK AT A TIME”.

Short Summary of my skills and work experience.

My extensive work experience was gained in highly competitive environments in Houston, Singapore, South Africa, Angola and Nigeria at major Industries namely Oil, Iron & Steel, Electrical Distribution, Plastic Manufacturing, Gas Processing (Ammonia and Methanol) and relate to construction and industrial environments.

I am experienced in Project Management and Supervision. Revenue Cycle Management. Personnel and Admin, Marketing, IT Billing, Revenue and Operational Management. Safety Practices, Material control, cost control, shutdown planning and commissioning. Electrical design, maintenance and installation of PLC, AC Machines and Control Systems, DC Control Equipment and Variable Speed Drives, Lighting Systems, Hazardous Location Equipment, HT Electrical Distribution, Electronics, Refrigeration and Appliances, Hydraulics, Mechanical Systems and Basic Welding. Training of management, technical and process staff by means of Competency and Outcome Based Training. Module and Maintenance Manual Development.

What is the product about?

  • Blocks that fit into each other in a pipe like manner. This gives the benefit of creating internal piping throughout the construction. This piping can be used for water, electricity or waste. Piping can also be filled with soil or cement for insulation and/or weigh.
  • Blocks can be bound together by other means eg. pvc glue, wire, etc.
  • Chambers / cavities can be filled with various materials for additional insulation if necessary.
  • Blocks will come in single or double configuration and variable sizes to suit every need.

Your contribution:

Contributions will change the lives of people all over the world. You only need to look at the news to see the suffering of people from Brazil to the Philippines, from Africa to America.

It will also benefit the DIY enthusiast to built that home, shed, home extension, or whatever the DIY mind can think up without the complex building methods available (Cement, sand, water, bricks, tiles, steelwork, etc).

Your contribution will help to develop the product from design to manufacturing and distribution while creating opportunities for people to empower themselves.

Your contribution will go to the following:

  • Final development and fine tuning.
  • Prototypes.
  • Building of molds.
  • Fabricating blocks.
  • Marketing and distribution.

Our ultimate goal is to use recycled plastic to fabricate our building blocks. This will allow us to help the environment and the people.

What will happen with the funds if we don't reach the entire goal?

  • Fewer Contributions will only mean a smaller start.
  • All the remaining funds after development will be used to make a difference towards disadvantaged communities by means of various outreaching projects all over the world.

What You Get:

  • Your contribution will make you the first receiver of the product in your country to build a standard tool shed. Alternatively you have the choice to donate the material in your name to a disadvantage person.
  • Think what DIY projects you can undertake with a product like this?

Challenges:

  • Within the development stage we will have the product registered and approved as a building method and building product.
  • To get the building method and product accepted by the community we will build prototypes within communities to demonstrate the concept and advantages.

Other Ways You Can Help:

If you can't make a monetary contribution please help us in the following ways:

  • Please get the word out in any way you can, a good tool to use is the Indiegogo share tools / Facebook / Twitter, etc.
  • Please identify communities in need for our initial campaign.  
  • Tell all your friends and family about this, and give out the direct address to this site:  http://igg.me/p/manufacturing-diy-plastic-blocks/x/8969726

story:
We can participate and change the stakes for the environment

Bulgaria is famous for its great old forests, breathtaking landscapes, clear high-mountain lakes, delicious food and wine and hospitable local communities. Bulgaria is also known for having been a socialist country for nearly half a century. The relationship between nature and our political and economic history lies in our heritage today and the threat that our magnificent mountains are facing now.

In the following couple of years most protected areas, forest regions and river basins in Bulgaria will get their management plans renewed and those will be valid for the next decade. Nothing bad with updating strategic planning, you might say... And you will be right. So, where does the problem come from?

The first problem: Bulgarian post-communist legacy is one of secrecy in decision- making. Often it is impossible to find information about what is being planned in the forest near your village. It is not only because you do not know how to find and access the information you need, but also because there is no such information available publicly. So we have difficult or no access to information and no real public discussion.

The second problem: It is an open secret that certain political groups are connected to companies interested in investing in activities that are harmful for protected areas. Even though there is no clear evidence for corruption, the facts show that institutions do not to punish crimes in protected areaswhen certain companies are involved. So we have clientelism and institutions that are hard to push to do their work.

The third problem: Many investments such as the development of a new ski resort or a new small water power plant have grave consequences on the environment and do not add value to the well-being of local communities. Once again such projects are not consulted with the public and often are executed in violation of environmental laws. So we have lack of respect for the law and irresponsible business investments.

What can happen?

Currently decision-makers are under great pressure from investors to allow for changes in the strategic planning of protected areas so that new investment projects can start running. One such project has been waiting since 2008 when it was declared incompatible with environmental law by the Ministry of Environment and Water itself. The intentions and plans of the investors have not changed since then.

You might wonder… What will happen if these changes in management of protected areas take place?

They will have catastrophic consequences for great territories with old forests, rare plants (found only in Bulgaria), bears, chamois, clear glacier lakes, rivers and many other precious resources. Places such as Rila, Pirin, Rhodope and Vitosha mountains, their forests and rivers will be damaged.

More information about the changes envisioned in the new management plan of Pirin Mountain can be found in the information graphic below:

You can find a high resolution file with the info-graphic here.

Protected areas should stay protected

Everyone knows that deforestation leads to erosion and floods, that chemicals poison drinking water, that high numbers of people in the wild scare animals away, that pollution leads to health problems. So, we think there is no need to explain why protected areas should stay protected.

How we are doing it?

For the last two years Sustainable Mountains works to solve the problems described above in the regions of Vitosha, Rila and Pirin mountains.

  • We are PRESENT in all public discussions related to nature and national parks, rivers and forests in South-west Bulgaria.

  • We DO research on terrain and work on legislative documents

  • We INFORM about what strategic planning of protected areas means and why and how everyone can participate

  • We CONSULT concrete civil proposals for each management plan with local communities and interested groups such as tourist and sports organizations, farmers, etc. and offer them to the respective institution in a summarized form

  • We are PART of expert working groups of the respective ministries and lobby for our proposals

  • We CREATE a strong and active group of volunteers and supporters of the environment

  • We SHARE our experience, know-how and technological capacity with other active civic groups

  • We ARE transparent and FIGHT for transparency on every level

About us

Sustainable Mountains is a group of environmental activists including experienced experts from environmental NGOs in Bulgaria and a group of young and active people that love nature and feel responsible for their community.

We are non-political and what we do is politics. We are independent in thought and action and we depend on institutions and decision-makers. We trust research and hard work and we get emotional about mountains, forests and rivers. We empower and support local groups and we lead our individual battles.

Our history

Some of us started working together in 2011 when there was a proposition to change Bulgarian Forestry Law in favour of an investment project in Vitosha mountain. The civil group then was called ZaVitosha and still functions as an active group in the capital of Bulgaria. Later on in 2013 the group grew larger and three NGOs (Balkani WIldlife Society, Bikearea Association and Fishermen Society Balkanka 2009) created a partnership in South-west Bulgaria to continue the work on changing the decision-making process regarding mountain resources management towards more transparency and in favour of local communities. And, we have had the Bulgarian-Swiss Cooperation Fund's trust and funding for a little more than two years now. We will be out of funding in the end of 2015, but our job has not been finished yet. We need to continue until our great mountains stay protected for the next 10 years.

What we need your help for

Sustainable Mountains will need more resources to continue its mission. Your donation will help us stay tuned with what happens in the ministries and make this information public. It will enable us to take action together and protect the mountains that evoke admiration each time one looks at them.

The only way to challenge non-transparent decision-making and nature destruction is civil participation. Because the only way to counter money in politics is with people. Your funding will help us continue our work:

  • Immediate action – campaign for nature, transparency and legality

  • Volunteer watchdogs – the people that we cannot do without, that follow websites of institutions and alarm when a document has been issued or a public meeting announced

  • Expert work – keep the people who do the actual legislative and research work, so that we offer adequate proposals to strategic planning documents

  • Website Sustainable Mountains – domain, hosting and support for our website for next year

And of course it is not all about the money. If you cannot, or you decide not to, contribute financially to the project, there is a lot you can do to support us. Sharing the campaign link with others, informing yourself about the problems with Bulgarian mountains and sharing the information. Joining us on Facebook. Taking part in the public discussions on our website or during one of our open events. Become a volunteer. Questioning the authorities, institutions and persons who could be but are not acting to protect nature and mountains.

Perks

We have beautiful post cards with different plants and animals such as the chamoix below.

Cotton bags and T-shirts are designed by 140 Ideas and will be printed once perks have been claimed. 

You can see the trailer of "Vitosha" - the movie.


Resources (in Bulgarian mostly)

Learn about: 

Management Plans of Nature and National Parks are here.

Rivers' management and our work here.

Forest management and our work here.

Our proposals for Pirin National Park's Management Plan here.

Our proposals for changes in regulations about Small Water Power Plants here.

The results from our petition for forests protection here.

story:
So What’s the Deal?

We are developing a cement which mimics the natural hardening processes used in nature by corals and other creatures to build our reefs.

While it might not sound like much, this revolutionary, potentially carbon-neutral marine-grade cement will significantly reduce global emissions and permanently transform the entire construction industry, especially the cement industry - which according to the US Environmental Protection Authority is currently the third largest source of pollution.


The Big Picture!

To make a change to an industry so large, we need big ideas and massive amounts of support and funding. With our ten year project now at the halfway point, I am so proud of how far we have come, but now we need your help to move into the biggest chapter of them all. 

We need to raise $350,000 to put together the next piece of the puzzle, and complete the final research & testing stage to make our much needed product and process a reality. 

Our big hairy goal is to provide truly sustainable, environmentally friendly building materials on an international level, and to positively impact both human and environmental health. With five solid years of research behind it, Quantum Cement is the breath of fresh air we've all been waiting for.

Even the biggest skyscrapers start with one small brick. Even the boldest revolutions start with one person. We need you to work with us to help mother nature combat some of the seriously crippling effects of our construction industries - and we're going to use her own recipe to do it. 

(you can find all the sources for numbers, facts and figures quoted here)

JUST A DROP IN THE OCEAN

In essence, our project uses sea water (brine) as a source of the minerals we need, which can either come as a by-product after a filtration process has occurred, or extracted from inland high saline waters. 

The system can also harness alternate non-fossil fuels, such as landfill gases or bio-gas, to produce the electricity needed.

So - our process not only produces a sustainable commercial cement alternative, but can also produce electricity using non-fossil fuels.  Amazing! However, getting there is no easy task. The enormous amount of blood, sweat and tears that we have put into this project so far are just a drop in the ocean compared to what's coming next! Check out exactly what this project really looks like:

2010 - 2013

Our founder Ren Daniele moved to the Gold Coast and began searching for sustainable development opportunities.

Ren carried out significant research on alternative sustainable building materials, such as bio-fibres (hemp) for large scale projects, aiming to develop them into a strong, pourable, useable construction material.

This project even saw him investigate a mobile 3D printing robotic system for house construction, using his hemp-based pourable material. (he's a pretty crazy guy sometimes!)

Having delved into the complexities & development of a sustainable material to use in residential housing construction, Ren realised he was looking at a much bigger issue, and discovered an overall need to create a much better, more efficient total building system.

2014

At the same time as he realised this project was going to be ‘a little bit’ bigger than he first envisaged, Ren was investigating the qualities of current building materials that he was trying to replicate sustainably. He discovered the inconvenient truth behind the production of ‘Ordinary Portland Cement’ (OPC) which is the cement we are all so familiar with today. 

OPC is created using a heat process that causes massive carbon emissions. The same heat process causes an unstable chemistry in OPC, which research is now showing causes serious health concerns in all those who come into close proximity with it! Ever been close to anything made of cement? Yeah, so have we. Scary, isn't it?

  • Globally, 5% of all greenhouse gases come from OPC cement manufacture, and while it’s very hard to measure exactly, the World Health Organisation (WHO) estimates another 12% of greenhouse gases are also associated with the product
  • Worldwide production is currently at 4 billion tonnes a year, rising by 3% annually in line with GDP growth
  • Worldwide, the industry is worth $350 billion
  • In Australia, we are currently producing about 10 million tonnes a year in an industry worth $2.3 billion, emitting 6 million tonnes of CO2-e, which is around 1% of total Australian’s emissions. 
Ren focused all his research and development into a building material that could not only be sustainably produced, but could be carbon-neutral, have zero negative effects on health, be as strong and flexural (think: flexes instead of crumbles in an earthquake), be fire retardent, and of course be cost effective for the construction industry. 
And, Quantum Cement was born.

2015 - TODAY - THIS IS WHERE YOU FIT IN!

Our established pilot program at one of Australia's leading universities is now ready to enter the final major phase - to research and ultimately develop the formula for Quantum Cement and its manufacture on a commercial scale. This stage of the project will take two years to complete and requires USD$350,000 to fund it. 

To us, that sounded like so much money! 

That is, until we realised just how small it really is in comparison to the size of the multi-billion dollar industry we are trying so hard to change.

If the current US population stands at 321 million people, and just over 0.1% of the population donated $1 each, our project would be funded! 

If the current Australian population stands at 23 million people, and just 1.5% of the population donated $1 each, our project would be funded! 

To recap- your money will go towards the final research & testing phase for the commercial production of Quantum Cement, undertaken by one of Australia's top universities. 

By putting your hand in your pocket today, you could be the tipping point we need to make a change to a $350 billion dollar industry. 

So we are doing everything in our power to make sure this project gets to the right people and creates change - for the better. 

Please - help us make a difference!

Ever been close to anything made of cement? Yeah, so have we. Scary, isn't it?



Globally, 5% of all greenhouse gases come from OPC cement
manufacture, and while it’s very hard to measure exactly, the World Health Organisation (WHO) estimates
another 12% of greenhouse gases are also associated with the product



Worldwide production is currently at 4 billion tonnes a
year, rising by 3% annually in line with GDP growth



Worldwide, the industry is worth $350 billion



In Australia, we are currently producing about 10 million
tonnes a year in an industry worth $2.3 billion, emitting 6 million tonnes of
CO2-e, which is around 1% of total Australian’s emissions. 


Ren focused all his research and development into a building material that could not only be sustainably produced, but could be carbon-neutral, have zero negative effects on health, be as strong and flexural (think: flexes instead of crumbles in an earthquake), be fire retardent, and of course be cost effective for the construction industry. And, Quantum Cement was born.
2015 - TODAY - THIS IS WHERE YOU FIT IN!

Our established pilot program at one of Australia's leading universities is now ready to enter the final major phase - to research and ultimately develop the formula for Quantum Cement and its manufacture on a commercial scale. This stage of the project will take two years to complete and requires USD$350,000 to fund it. 
To us, that sounded like so much money! 
That is, until we realised just how small it really is in comparison to the size of the multi-billion dollar industry we are trying so hard to change.
If the current US population stands at 321 million people, and just over 0.1% of the population donated $1 each, our project would be funded! 
If the current Australian population stands at 23 million people, and just 1.5% of the population donated $1 each, our project would be funded! 
To recap- your money will go towards the final research & testing phase for the commercial production of Quantum Cement, undertaken by one of Australia's top universities. 

By putting your hand in your pocket today, you could be the tipping point we need to make a change to a $350 billion dollar industry. 

So we are doing everything in our power to make sure this project gets to the right people and creates change - for the better. Please - help us make a difference!

story:
Kurzbeschreibung

Ich heiße Alban Burster, komme aus Büdingen und bin 19 Jahre alt. Ich habe vor etwa 2 Jahren ein Projekt ins Leben gerufen, was nun mittlerweile eine große Bedeutung für die Region hat. Der Unwetterdienst ist die Anlaufstelle für die regionale Beratung im Bezug auf das ( Un ) Wetter. Der UWD ist von anderen Diensten unabhängig, aufgrund eigener Grafiken, welche speziell für die Region angefertigt wurden. Jedoch muss der regionale Warndienst auf Stationen anderer Anbieter zurückgreifen, um Abschätzen zu können, wie sich das Wetter entwickelt. Leider stehen in der Region viel zu wenige Stationen, die Daten bereitstellen, um zum Beispiel im Winter genauer vor Schnee und Glätte zu warnen. In Zukunft möchte man anstreben, ein eigenes Stationen -Netz aufzubauen. 

Was du uns gibst & was du bekommst

Da ich mit 19 Jahren als Oberstufenschüler noch kein geregeltes Einkommen erzielen kann, benötige ich die Hilfe der Region. Die Kampagne dient dazu, etwas von der Region für die Region zu geben. Mit diesem Motto arbeitet der regionale Warndienst. Durch das Messnetz kann man nun mal konkrete Daten sammeln, die der regionale Warndienst aufarbeiten kann. Dabei ist die Qualität der Daten sehr wichtig. Aus diesem Grund werden professionelle Stationen benötigt, die mit hoch Modernen Messinstrumenten ausgestattet sind. 
Der oben genannte Betrag von 1.500€ dient als Startversuch. Damit kann man eine oder vielleicht sogar zwei Stationen erwerben. Selbstverständlich kommt die Infrastruktur inklusive Wartung mit dazu. 
Falls der Betrag nicht erreicht wird, wird dieses Geld entweder an die Unterstützer zurückgezahlt oder nach Absprache in neue Gerätschaften investiert. Zum Beispiel ein großer Rechner.

Die Folgen

Mit der Unterstützung von der Region gibt der Unwetterdienst im Prinzip der Region einen neuen besseren Service zurück. Dieses Projekt ist so in Deutschland einmalig. Auch die Entwicklung des Projekts würde somit einen großen Sprung nach oben machen, wobei natürlich jede Person aus der Region auf der Homepage alle Daten einsehen kann, welche die Stationen messen. Dieser Abschnitt des Projekts wird eine längere Geschichte werden. Denn mit ein oder zwei Stationen kann man kein Netz aufbauen. Auf jeden Fall muss irgendwann ein Grundstein gelegt werden. Und dieser Gedanke mit einem eigenen Messnetz schwebt mir schon lange im Kopf herum. 

Risiken & Herausforderungen

Selbstverständlich gibt es Risiken und Herausforderungen bezüglich dieser Sache. Aber vielleicht ist es der Anfang von etwas großem? Jeder fängt klein an. Und ich habe die Motivation, dieses Ding durch zu ziehen, um ein einmaliges Projekt in Deutschland aufzustellen. Die Motivation findet sich Tag täglich beim Unwetterdienst. Zu den Herausforderungen: Sobald eine Station gekauft wird, muss selbstverständlich Platz da sein. Am Besten wären freie Flächen, um genaue Werte zu messen. Darüber hinaus müssen die Stationen immer wieder mal gecheckt und gewartet werden, denn draußen in der Natur kann es immer wieder zu Schäden kommen. Wichtig ist, dass diese von der Öffentlichkeit so gut wie es geht fern gehalten wird, um Vandalismus zu verhindern. 

Andere Wege, wie man helfen kann

Natürlich wäre es lieb, wenn diese Kampagne geteilt wird, damit viele Menschen davon mitbekommen. 

Dazu ist das Tool von IndieGoGo wichtig, aber auch Daumen drücken das alles glückt kann helfen. :)



Dankeschön!

story:
Hello, Мy name is Hristo. I'm from Bulgaria. I'm a proud owner of a small farm producing fertilizers. The area I live in is highly contaminated with heavy metals from the factory for ore processing. For this reason I decided to start manufacturing organic farm fertilizer, purified from all heavy metals. In several years it has shown to decrease the concentration of heavy metals in the soil.
If you want more info about fertilizer please check     My farm
                                       http://farmtheworm.weebly.com/
Because we are a small farm we need a little help to establish the market outside Bulgaria. I hope to organize and build a distribution network with your help. With the help of crowdsourcing we will buy a small truck for delivering of the goods, a sieving machine of fertilizer and its packaging, and a small tractor that we can serve the farm. The technique will be second-hand.

It is essential to build an automated system for irrigation of beds with worms because summer temperatures rise and rainfall is rare though plentiful. I've designed the machine processing of fertilizer myself. The system includes an electric pump for water, the necessary hoses and devices for irrigation and timer and structure on which to fasten it.

The main idea of this project farm is not just to sell environmentally friendly products to the final customer, but to make it available to all organic farming.
Big, industrial-scale farmers are trying to produce more and more for a low total cost. The cost is however, paid by the final customer in the form of fruits and vegetables full of chemicals, nitrates and heavy metals. In the coming year we have an idea to start to produce food products that are fully and completely ecologically grown to strive to offer our customers the lowest possible price, by targeting the most vulnerable groups, namely the elderly and children.

In the new year the main problems before we face are promoting the product and its distribution to the customer, and the very maintenance of the farm and the animals in it. With your help we can introduce more people to the product and it imposed on small household farms in Bulgaria mandatory for every household .
If we can do that in a few years the soil condition will improve and the concentration of hazardous metals such as lead and cadmium will be in a much better ratio than current. 
For the last years in my native village permanently die young people, mainly girls "unexplained" reasons, just while they sleep. I do not think this is just coincidence and no one wants to admit that nature strikes back.
If we look around we see how human activity in any way pollute the environment and that it has given us the opportunity we have to fix it and start to lead a healthier life just by using its resources.Transport, cosmetics, manufacturing, energy disposed exclusively amount of heavy metals in the air, then we or inhale them or fall in the soil, where accumulate and accumulate. Planting fruits and vegetables in contaminated soil and expect them to be useful to us. 
The next time you submit carrot child will remember you for this project? 
Will it be more useful or hurt us?
That you want to leave for posterity?

This small project will not win the war, this is just a small battle, but this is the beginning and the beginning is difficult and will go with a small step forward, only forward, not give up because of no reason and no one perhaps after years as turn back, see through what we went through,
I'll say it was hard, but we did it, WE WON THE WAR!  
At this point I'm invested in this project, about $ 10,000, with which I purchased land (due to the regulation of the activities) built fence and drilling, irrigation system, the cells for the treatment of organic humus, acquired all necessary for the activity and maintenance animal.
If you think not much at an annual average wage about $ 5,000, think again.

If you want to help me, you can share this campaign with your friends and acquaintances. Use the Indiegogo tools and share it on social networks so that more people become familiar with it.

Donate $ 1 here please:

 https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/the-farm--13?secret_perk_token=84b6f76d

Thank you from my heart and hope to succeed together.

God bless you...
